report.title: Import params for import
report.description: Gets the range of parameters for an import, e.g. the min and max wind speed or temperature to feed into an import.
report.query: select min(extract(doy from date_start)) as doy_from, max(extract(doy from date_start)) as doy_to, avg(st_x(st_centroid(st_transform(geom, 27700)))) as x_avg, avg(st_y(st_centroid(st_transform(geom, 27700)))) as y_avg, min(temperature_c) as temperature_c_low, max(temperature_c) as temperature_c_high, min(wind_speed_mph) as wind_speed_mph_low, max(wind_speed_mph) as wind_speed_mph_high, string_agg(distinct external_key, ',') as taxa_taxon_list_external_keys from ecobat_occurrences where import_guid='#input_import_guid#'
